contents.text: Thank you for calling Vineti, the San Francisco–based software platform powering cell and gene therapy programs.
For Sales and Product Information, press 1.
To speak with a sales representative, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and contract options for deploying Vineti in our cell therapy program
I’m coordinating a VA cell therapy program and need to speak with a sales rep about enterprise licensing.
Discuss enterprise licensing tiers, API integration options, and custom pricing with a sales rep
I need to speak to a sales representative to help me understand purchasing options and pricing.
I’d like to discuss academic licensing options and pricing for your gene therapy platform for my thesis research.

contents.text: To learn about our platform features, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a product specialist.

navigationGoals: Review Vineti's core platform features to determine fit with our processes
I’m leading a gene therapy study for veterans and want to learn about Vineti’s platform features.
Explore the platform’s workflow automation modules, API endpoints, and analytics dashboards with a product specialist
I’d like to learn about the features your software offers for managing my therapy program.
I want to learn about your platform’s sample tracking and data integration features for my lab experiments.

contents.text: For Technical Support and Billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Fix the API integration error preventing data synchronization
I’m having trouble uploading patient treatment data at the VA facility and need technical support.
Troubleshoot upload errors and integration failures in the cell therapy software with technical support
I’m having trouble accessing the platform and need technical support to fix it.
I need help troubleshooting an API error I encountered when uploading my cell data.

contents.text: For Billing and Account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Resolve the billing discrepancy on our recent invoice and update payment details
I need to update our VA account billing details and clarify the recent invoice charges.
Clarify invoice line items, adjust subscription seat count, and update payment method with billing
I need assistance understanding my bill and payment options.
I have questions about the billing invoice for our student group’s subscription.
